remarks: Lemma used in proofs of substitution properties.  Like ~ equs5 but, in intuitionistic logic, replacing negation and implication with disjunction makes this a stronger result.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 2-Feb-2018.)
statement: equs5or $p |- ( A. x x = y \/ ( E. x ( x = y /\ ph ) -> A. x ( x = y -> ph ) ) ) $.
